rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment reports a factual finding ('Most, but not all, of the virus was killed') without high-potency framing.
The segment uses 'was killed' (plain outcome) with vague scale ('Most, but not all'), but not a moderate verb paired with scale/impact.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
This segment reports study findings but contains no explicit calming language.
